snippet: In Fatou Bensouda’s first months as chief prosecutor at the International Criminal Court, things have not gone as well as they could have.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Fatou Bensouda, native of Gambia who is chief prosecutor at International Criminal Court at The Hague.
lead_paragraph: In Fatou Bensouda’s first months as chief prosecutor at the International Criminal Court, things have not gone as well as they could have.

headline.seo: Challenging Start for Bensouda as Chief Prosecutor in The Hague
headline.main: A Lifelong Passion Is Now Put to Practice in The Hague
headline.print_headline: A Lifelong Passion Is Now Put to Practice in The Hague
